name: Updock
description: What's Updock? Other than a famous query by an even more famous bunny, it's a beautiful script font with a nearly upright stress. Updock is an extremely legible formal script with clean connectors and a variety of of discretionary ligatures. It comes with Latin Character sets including Western, Central, and Vietnamese language support. To contribute, see github.com/googlefonts/updock .
author: Robert Leuschke
